title: Handle a Supplier Bankruptcy
description: A key supplier suddenly declares bankruptcy, creating a major supply chain risk.

tasks.description: Receive the news of the supplier's bankruptcy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The procurement team is alerted to the issue.

tasks.description: Immediately identify all products sourced from that supplier and their current inventory levels.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of at-risk products.

tasks.description: Begin an emergency sourcing process to find alternative suppliers for the at-risk products.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent starts searching for and contacting potential new suppliers.
